tha-ap532:6.3: Āsahaṁ dhanadhaññassa → āsabhaṁ dhanadhaññassa (sya1ed, sya2ed); anantadhanadhaññassa (mr)
tha-ap532:8.3: Haṁsarutehi nigghosaṁ → haṁsarudābhinigghosaṁ (bj); haṁsadundubhinigghosaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap532:21.4: hantā ātāpī tāpaso → tāpitā ca visositā (sya1ed, sya2ed); hantā tātāpi tāpaso (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap532:27.4: sabbagandhova hoti me → sabbagandhotiseti me (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap532:29.2: Phalaṁ tu → phalantaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); phalan tu (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap532:30.2: hitāya ca na sadisaṁ → hitāya janasandhisu (bj, pts-vp-pli1); hitāyanaṁ sukhāvahaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap532:30.4: saṅgho vīrasamāyuto → saraddhanisamāyuto (bj); saṅgho vīrasamāsuto (sya1ed, sya2ed); rasaddhovisamāyuto (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap532:32.1: Khīṇe āyusi → khīṇe pāsusi (sya1ed, sya2ed); khīṇevāyupi (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap532:36.1: titthikākiṇṇe → janoghe titthakākiṇṇe (bj); jino yo titthikātiṇṇo (sya1ed, sya2ed); janoghe titthikākiṇṇo (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap532:39.4: paribhūto na tenahaṁ → paribhūtena tenahaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
